author: spiralway
title: Nourish LATAM: Spirulina & Cardano
description: Malnutrition in LATAM is in it's worst levels, COVID-19 threatens food availability and economic access to quality food.
solution: Spirulina cultivated in photo-bioreactors in a decentralized way could be the solution to strengthen the inmune system of millions in LATAM.
experience: Entrepreneur with years of experience cultivating spirulina and IoT, blockchain and photo-biorreactors technologies.
